EmailTemplate.description: IN USE Email sent when change request is rejected by the Applicant
EmailTemplate.name: Change Request Rejection
EmailTemplate.subject: Change Request for Application {!ChangeRequest__c.Application__c} Rejected by {!ChangeRequest__c.ApplicantName__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Subject: Change Request {!ChangeRequest__c.Name} rejection notification.
Dear {!ChangeRequest__c.CreatedBy},
Change Request {!ChangeRequest__c.Name} rejected by Applicant {!ChangeRequest__c.ApplicantName__c} . Rejection reasons : {!ChangeRequest__c.RejectionReason__c}.
Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the GovGrants support govgrant@support.com if you have any questions or need assistance.
Sincerely, Enterprise Grants Management System(EGMS)
